## Setup

Import required libraries:

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("httr")
library("jsonlite")
```

## Key

```{r}
# saving your API key
api_key <- "sROtzp89HIqkAAy1g5Vai9mGX6afqA1i"
```

```{r}
base_url = "https://api.nytimes.com/svc/search/v2/articlesearch.json?q=election&api-key="
```

```{r}
# sending a request
response <- GET(base_url, query = list("q" = "election", "api-key" = api_key))
```

```{r}
# parse the response
json <- content(response, "parsed")
#json
```

```{r}
json$response$docs[[2]/]
```
